name: Car of Theseus
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50, theme: Delay the inevitable.

Use arrow keys of wasd to walk around, touch your car to get in and drive. Keep it fuelled up by holding the mouse button down on sandworms and dragging the oil they spit out onto your car. Keep your wheels in tact by dragging bushes and releasing them, and dragging the wheels that fall off onto your car's wheels.

Find the three green fruit to save your dad.

Made with Unity, photoshop, the voice memo app on my phone & audacity.

May have bugs and lag. If it's lagging you might be able to get around that with the windows build.

Also, check out my twitter: https://twitter.com/Reecyboii
